title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Carriage of Goods and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Carriage of Goods and 

Passengers by Sea) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (carriage good passenger sea) order 2020

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: 2. (1) In this Order -
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order - 

“Act of 1993” means the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993); 

“data set” means a data set specified in Annex VIII to the Directive; 

“Directive” means Directive 2009/42/EC of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 6 May 20091, as amended by Commission 
Decision 2010/216/EU of 14 April 20102, Regulation (EU) No. 
1090/2010 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 24 
November 20103 and Commission Delegated Decision 2012/186/EU of 
3 February 20124; 

“goods” includes goods shipped to offshore installations and goods 
reclaimed from the seabed and unloaded in ports but does not include 
bunkers and stores supplied to seagoing vessels; 

“quarter” means a period of 3 months ending on 31 March, 30 June, 30 
September or 31 December in any year; 

“seagoing vessel” means a seagoing vessel other than - 

1 OJ No. L 141, 6.6.2009, p. 29 
2 OJ No. L 94, 15.4.2010, p. 33 
3 OJ No. L 325, 9.12.2010, p. 1 
4 OJ No. L 101, 11.4.2012, p. 5 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th January, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [5] 3 

a vessel which navigates exclusively in inland waters or in 
waters within, or closely adjacent to, sheltered waters or areas 
where port regulations apply, 

a fish-catching vessel, 

a fish-processing vessel, 

a vessel for drilling and exploration, 

a tug, 

a pusher craft, 

a research and survey vessel, 

a dredger, 

a naval vessel, or 

a vessel used solely for non-commercial purposes; 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

(e) 

(f) 

(g) 

(h) 

(i) 

(j) 

“survey” means the survey that is conducted by the Central Statistics 
Office for the purposes of obtaining information specified in Articles 3, 
4, 6 and 7, including for the purposes of compliance with the Directive 
in so far as it relates to Annex VIII thereto. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Directive has the same meaning in this Order as in the Directive, except where 
the context otherwise requires.

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: 3. A requirement on a port authority specified in Part 1 of the Schedule to
text_raw:
3. A requirement on a port authority specified in Part 1 of the Schedule to 
provide, for the purposes of the survey, information in accordance with data 
sets A1, A2, C1, D1 and F2 relating to - 

(a) 

the goods loaded onto or unloaded from, and the passengers who 
embarked onto or disembarked from, each seagoing vessel of a 
maritime transport operator, and 

(b) 

each vessel referred to in paragraph (a), 

at each port of the port authority during a quarter specified in Article 5 is 
prescribed for the purposes of section 25 of the Act of 1993.
text_norm: 3 requirement port authority specified part 1 schedule provide purpose survey information accordance data set a1 a2 c1 d1 f2 relating - (a) good loaded onto unloaded passenger embarked onto disembarked seagoing vessel maritime transport operator (b) vessel referred paragraph (a) port port authority quarter specified article 5 prescribed purpose section 25 act 1993

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: 4. A requirement on a port authority specified in Part 2 of the Schedule to
text_raw:
4. A requirement on a port authority specified in Part 2 of the Schedule to 
provide, for the purposes of the survey, information in accordance with data 
sets A1, A2, C1 and F2 relating to - 

(a) 

the goods loaded onto or unloaded from each seagoing vessel of 
a maritime transport operator, and 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [5] 

(b) 

each vessel referred to in paragraph (a), 

at each port of the port authority during a quarter specified in Article 5 is 
prescribed for the purposes of section 25 of the Act of 1993.
text_norm: 4 requirement port authority specified part 2 schedule provide purpose survey information accordance data set a1 a2 c1 f2 relating - (a) good loaded onto unloaded seagoing vessel maritime transport operator 4 5 (b) vessel referred paragraph (a) port port authority quarter specified article 5 prescribed purpose section 25 act 1993

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: 5. The port authorities in relation to whom a requirement to provide
text_raw:
5. The port authorities in relation to whom a requirement to provide 
information is prescribed in Article 3 or 4 shall provide the relevant 
information - 

(a) where the information relates to the quarter ending on 31 

December 2019, once only, and 

(b) quarterly, and in relation to the immediately preceding quarter, 

in the period from 1 April 2020 to 31 December 2024.
text_norm: 5 port authority relation requirement provide information prescribed article 3 4 shall provide relevant information - (a) information relates quarter ending 31 december 2019 (b) quarterly relation immediately preceding quarter period 1 april 2020 31 december 2024

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: 6. A requirement on a port authority specified in Part 1 or 2 of the
text_raw:
6. A requirement on a port authority specified in Part 1 or 2 of the 
Schedule to provide, for the purposes of the survey, information in accordance 
with data sets A3, B1 and E1 relating to - 

(a) 

the goods loaded onto or unloaded from, and the passengers who 
embarked onto or disembarked from, each seagoing vessel of a 
maritime transport operator, and 

(b) 

each vessel referred to in paragraph (a), 

at each port of the port authority during a year specified in Article 8 is 
prescribed for the purposes of section 25 of the Act of 1993.

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: 8. The port authorities in relation to whom a requirement to provide
text_raw:
8. The port authorities in relation to whom a requirement to provide 
information is prescribed in Article 6 or 7 shall provide the relevant 
information - 

(a) where the information relates to 2019, once only, and 

(b) 

annually, and in relation to the immediately preceding year, in 
the period 2021 to 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 6 [5]

section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and for the purpose
heading: Port Authorities to which Articles 3 and 6 apply
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

PART 1 

Port Authorities to which Articles 3 and 6 apply 

Port of Cork Company. 

Dublin Port Company. 

Iarnród Éireann - Irish Rail in so far as the control or management of 
Rosslare Harbour is concerned. 

PART 2 

Port Authorities to which Articles 4 and 6 apply 

Bantry Bay Harbour Commissioners. 

Drogheda Port Company. 

Shannon Foynes Port Company. 

Port of Waterford Company. 

PART 3 

Port Authorities to which Article 7 applies 

Arklow Harbour Commissioners. 

Carlingford Lough Shipping Agency Ltd. in so far as the control or 
management of Greenore Port is concerned. 

Dún Laoghaire Harbour Company. 

Dundalk Harbour Commissioners. 

Galway Harbour Company. 

Kilrush Town Council in so far as the maintenance of Cappa Pier at 
Kilrush is concerned. 

Kinsale Harbour Commissioners. 

The Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine in so far as: 

(a) 

the fishery harbour centre referred to as Castletownbere 
Fishery Harbour Centre in the Fishery Harbour Centre 
(Castletownbere) Order 1970 (S.I. No. 57 of 1970) is 
concerned; 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [5] 7 

(b) 

the fishery harbour centre referred to as Killybegs 
Fishery Harbour Centre in the Fishery Harbour Centre 
(Killybegs) Order 1969 (S.I. No. 210 of 1969) is 
concerned.
